name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redocd - New Tab with Doc It Feature

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides the ability to go to an online app and 'doc' a file or URL right to your Redocd page and can add a Propage to the New Tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 'Redocd - New Tab with Doc It Feature' Chrome Extension provides you unprecedented ability to navigate to any online application or website, and 'doc' a file or URL directly to your Redocd page(s).  Also, this extension allows for the Chrome New Tab to be replaced with a quick-access view of your current project, so you can easily navigate to all of your important files and content.
